xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/727738-Breath 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/nJuKPogNLuWSPmfwkdHIjkwV4nV.jpg It is the story of a deaf girl in Shanghai. Despite the hectic pace of the city, she still feels a strong sense of loneliness. Although there are multiple parties and opportunities to meet new faces, she still feels unique in the crowd. At the end of the film they explain that many people who suffer from deafness are diagnosed with depression or anxiety. The girl represents all those millions of beings in the world that are not included. Breath
